verses.verse: Then came near<WH5066> the heads<WH7218> of the fathers<WH1> of the Levites<WH3881> unto Eleazar<WH499> the priest<WH3548>, and unto Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun<WH5126>, and unto the heads<WH7218> of the fathers<WH1> of the tribes<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>;

And they spake<WH1696> unto them at Shiloh<WH7887> in the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667>, saying<WH559>, The LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> by the hand<WH3027> of Moses<WH4872> to give<WH5414> us cities<WH5892> to dwell in<WH3427>, with the suburbs<WH4054> thereof for our cattle<WH929>.

And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> gave<WH5414> unto the Levites<WH3881> out of their inheritance<WH5159>, at the commandment<WH6310> of the LORD<WH3068>, these cities<WH5892> and their suburbs<WH4054>.

And the lot<WH1486> came out<WH3318> for the families<WH4940> of the Kohathites<WH6956>: and the children<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> the priest<WH3548>, which were of the Levites<WH3881>, had by lot<WH1486> out of the tribe<WH4294> of Judah<WH3063>, and out of the tribe<WH4294> of Simeon<WH8099>, and out of the tribe<WH4294> of Benjamin<WH1144>, thirteen<WH7969><WH6240> cities<WH5892>.

And the rest<WH3498> of the children<WH1121> of Kohath<WH6955> had by lot<WH1486> out of the families<WH4940> of the tribe<WH4294> of Ephraim<WH669>, and out of the tribe<WH4294> of Dan<WH1835>, and out of the half<WH2677> tribe<WH4294> of Manasseh<WH4519>, ten<WH6235> cities<WH5892>.

And the children<WH1121> of Gershon<WH1648> had by lot<WH1486> out of the families<WH4940> of the tribe<WH4294> of Issachar<WH3485>, and out of the tribe<WH4294> of Asher<WH836>, and out of the tribe<WH4294> of Naphtali<WH5321>, and out of the half<WH2677> tribe<WH4294> of Manasseh<WH4519> in Bashan<WH1316>, thirteen<WH7969><WH6240> cities<WH5892>.

The children<WH1121> of Merari<WH4847> by their families<WH4940> had out of the tribe<WH4294> of Reuben<WH7205>, and out of the tribe<WH4294> of Gad<WH1410>, and out of the tribe<WH4294> of Zebulun<WH2074>, twelve<WH8147><WH6240> cities<WH5892>.

And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> gave<WH5414> by lot<WH1486> unto the Levites<WH3881> these cities<WH5892> with their suburbs<WH4054>, as the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> by the hand<WH3027> of Moses<WH4872>.

¶ And they gave<WH5414> out of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063>, and out of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Simeon<WH8095>, these cities<WH5892> which are here mentioned<WH7121> by name<WH8034>,

Which the children<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175>, being of the families<WH4940> of the Kohathites<WH6956>, who were of the children<WH1121> of Levi<WH3878>, had: for theirs was the first<WH7223><WH7223> lot<WH1486>.

And they gave<WH5414> them the city<WH7151> of Arba<WH704><WH7153> the father<WH1> of Anak<WH6061>, which city is Hebron<WH2275>, in the hill<WH2022> country of Judah<WH3063>, with the suburbs<WH4054> thereof round about<WH5439> it.
But the fields<WH7704> of the city<WH5892>, and the villages<WH2691> thereof, gave<WH5414> they to Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh<WH3312> for his possession<WH272>.

¶ Thus they gave<WH5414> to the children<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> the priest<WH3548> Hebron<WH2275> with her suburbs<WH4054>, to be a city<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733> for the slayer<WH7523>; and Libnah<WH3841> with her suburbs<WH4054>,
And Jattir<WH3492> with her suburbs<WH4054>, and Eshtemoa<WH851> with her suburbs<WH4054>,
And Holon<WH2473> with her suburbs<WH4054>, and Debir<WH1688> with her suburbs<WH4054>,

And Ain<WH5871> with her suburbs<WH4054>, and Juttah<WH3194> with her suburbs<WH4054>, and Beth-shemesh<WH1053> with her suburbs<WH4054>; nine<WH8672> cities<WH5892> out of those two<WH8147> tribes<WH7626>.
And out of the tribe<WH4294> of Benjamin<WH1144>, Gibeon<WH1391> with her suburbs<WH4054>, Geba<WH1387> with her suburbs<WH4054>,
Anathoth<WH6068> with her suburbs<WH4054>, and Almon<WH5960> with her suburbs<WH4054>; four<WH702> cities<WH5892>.
All the cities<WH5892> of the children<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175>, the priests<WH3548>, were thirteen<WH7969><WH6240> cities<WH5892> with their suburbs<WH4054>.

¶ And the families<WH4940> of the children<WH1121> of Kohath<WH6955>, the Levites<WH3881> which remained<WH3498> of the children<WH1121> of Kohath<WH6955>, even they had the cities<WH5892> of their lot<WH1486> out of the tribe<WH4294> of Ephraim<WH669>.

For they gave<WH5414> them Shechem<WH7927> with her suburbs<WH4054> in mount<WH2022> Ephraim<WH669>, to be a city<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733> for the slayer<WH7523>; and Gezer<WH1507> with her suburbs<WH4054>,
And Kibzaim<WH6911> with her suburbs<WH4054>, and Beth-horon<WH1032> with her suburbs<WH4054>; four<WH702> cities<WH5892>.
And out of the tribe<WH4294> of Dan<WH1835>, Eltekeh<WH514> with her suburbs<WH4054>, Gibbethon<WH1405> with her suburbs<WH4054>,
Aijalon<WH357> with her suburbs<WH4054>, Gath-rimmon<WH1667> with her suburbs<WH4054>; four<WH702> cities<WH5892>.
And out of the half<WH4276> tribe<WH4294> of Manasseh<WH4519>, Tanach<WH8590> with her suburbs<WH4054>, and Gath-rimmon<WH1667> with her suburbs<WH4054>; two<WH8147> cities<WH5892>.
All the cities<WH5892> were ten<WH6235> with their suburbs<WH4054> for the families<WH4940> of the children<WH1121> of Kohath<WH6955> that remained<WH3498>.

¶ And unto the children<WH1121> of Gershon<WH1648>, of the families<WH4940> of the Levites<WH3881>, out of the other half<WH2677> tribe<WH4294> of Manasseh<WH4519> they gave Golan<WH1474> in Bashan<WH1316> with her suburbs<WH4054>, to be a city<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733> for the slayer<WH7523>; and Beesh-terah<WH1203> with her suburbs<WH4054>; two<WH8147> cities<WH5892>.
And out of the tribe<WH4294> of Issachar<WH3485>, Kishon<WH7191> with her suburbs<WH4054>, Dabareh<WH1705> with her suburbs<WH4054>,
Jarmuth<WH3412> with her suburbs<WH4054>, En-gannim<WH5873> with her suburbs<WH4054>; four<WH702> cities<WH5892>.
And out of the tribe<WH4294> of Asher<WH836>, Mishal<WH4861> with her suburbs<WH4054>, Abdon<WH5658> with her suburbs<WH4054>,
Helkath<WH2520> with her suburbs<WH4054>, and Rehob<WH7340> with her suburbs<WH4054>; four<WH702> cities<WH5892>.

And out of the tribe<WH4294> of Naphtali<WH5321>, Kedesh<WH6943> in Galilee<WH1551> with her suburbs<WH4054>, to be a city<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733> for the slayer<WH7523>; and Hammoth-dor<WH2576> with her suburbs<WH4054>, and Kartan<WH7178> with her suburbs<WH4054>; three<WH7969> cities<WH5892>.
All the cities<WH5892> of the Gershonites<WH1649> according to their families<WH4940> were thirteen<WH7969><WH6240> cities<WH5892> with their suburbs<WH4054>.

¶ And unto the families<WH4940> of the children<WH1121> of Merari<WH4847>, the rest<WH3498> of the Levites<WH3881>, out of the tribe<WH4294> of Zebulun<WH2074>, Jokneam<WH3362> with her suburbs<WH4054>, and Kartah<WH7177> with her suburbs<WH4054>,
Dimnah<WH1829> with her suburbs<WH4054>, Nahalal<WH5096> with her suburbs<WH4054>; four<WH702> cities<WH5892>.
And out of the tribe of Reuben<WH7205>, Bezer<WH1221> with her suburbs, and Jahazah<WH3096> with her suburbs,
Kedemoth<WH6932> with her suburbs, and Mephaath<WH4158> with her suburbs; four<WH702> cities<WH5892>.

And out of the tribe<WH4294> of Gad<WH1410>, Ramoth<WH7433> in Gilead<WH1568> with her suburbs<WH4054>, to be a city<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733> for the slayer<WH7523>; and Mahanaim<WH4266> with her suburbs<WH4054>,
Heshbon<WH2809> with her suburbs<WH4054>, Jazer<WH3270> with her suburbs<WH4054>; four<WH702> cities<WH5892> in all.

So all the cities<WH5892> for the children<WH1121> of Merari<WH4847> by their families<WH4940>, which were remaining<WH3498> of the families<WH4940> of the Levites<WH3881>, were by their lot<WH1486> twelve<WH8147><WH6240> cities<WH5892>.

All the cities<WH5892> of the Levites<WH3881> within<WH8432> the possession<WH272> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> were forty<WH705> and eight<WH8083> cities<WH5892> with their suburbs<WH4054>.
These cities<WH5892> were every one<WH5892><WH5892> with their suburbs<WH4054> round about<WH5439> them: thus were all these cities<WH5892>.
¶ And the LORD<WH3068> gave<WH5414> unto Israel<WH3478> all the land<WH776> which he sware<WH7650> to give<WH5414> unto their fathers<WH1>; and they possessed<WH3423> it, and dwelt<WH3427> therein.

And the LORD<WH3068> gave them rest<WH5117> round about<WH5439>, according to all that he sware<WH7650> unto their fathers<WH1>: and there stood<WH5975> not a man<WH376> of all their enemies<WH341> before<WH6440> them; the LORD<WH3068> delivered<WH5414> all their enemies<WH341> into their hand<WH3027>.
There failed<WH5307> not ought<WH1697> of any good<WH2896> thing<WH1697> which the LORD<WH3068> had spoken<WH1696> unto the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>; all came to pass<WH935>.
